app.title: BodyMetrics
app.subtitle: Body Composition Analysis with total privacy.

dashboard.client_exists_message: Client Code or Alias already exists, try another.
dashboard.inbox_empty: All caught up! No pending measurements to link, or the SD files have not been loaded
dashboard.select_client_prompt: Select a client from the list to view their progress.
dashboard.no_data_client: This client has no linked measurements yet or the SD files have not been loaded.
dashboard.no_clients_created: You haven't created any clients yet

help.starting_requirements_text:
‚Ä¢ Modern browser (Chrome, Brave, Safari, Edge, etc).
‚Ä¢ SD card with files from your Tanita BC-601/602/613.
‚Ä¢ **No internet required** after installation (100% Offline).
help.starting_installation_text: To use full screen and offline, look for the **'Install App'** icon in the address bar (PC) or **'Add to Home Screen'** in your browser menu (Mobile).
help.starting_first_steps_text:
1. **Load** (Inbox): Drag/Upload `DATA.CSV` files from SD card to the app.
2. **Link** (Inbox): Link new measurements to a client.
3. **Visualize** (Clients): Analyze your clients progress.

*Note: Create the profile in Clients tab first if it's a new person.*
help.clients_creation_text: It is recommended to use **Codes** (e.g., `C001`) or **Aliases** (e.g., `JOHN DOE`) instead of real names. Keep a private external spreadsheet or database linking the code to the real person for maximum security.
help.clients_buttons_logic_text:
The scale only has 4 memory slots. We recommend:

‚Ä¢ **Buttons 1, 2, & 3:** Use for yourself or fixed family members.
‚Ä¢ **Button 4 (Wildcard):** Use for multiple clients as described in the next section.
help.clients_infinite_trick_text:
‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE SD CARD** from the scale.
2. Hold **SET** and choose **number 4**.
3. Configure in this order: **Birth Date**, **Gender**, **Height**, and **Activity Level**.
4. When asked **CLr?** (Clear), select **YES**.
5. üíæ **INSERT SD CARD**.
6. Step on the scale to measure.

**Result:** New data is saved to `DATA4.CSV` without deleting previous ones.
help.files_where_text:
The scale creates files based on the button pressed:
‚Ä¢ **Button 1:** `DATA1.CSV` (and `DATA5`).
‚Ä¢ **Button 2:** `DATA2.CSV` (and `DATA6`).
‚Ä¢ **Button 3:** `DATA3.CSV` (and `DATA7`).
‚Ä¢ **Button 4:** `DATA4.CSV` (and `DATA8`).
help.files_structure_text: The app reads `DATA.CSV` files but **does not modify the SD**. It creates a **'virtual link'** in the browser between the measurement date and the Client.
help.files_troubleshooting_text:
If your SD has years of data, **organize in batches**:
1. Load only Button 1 files (`DATA1`/`DATA5`) in **Inbox**.
2. Use **Multi-Link** to assign them to 'Mom' (e.g.).
3. Load Button 2 files (`DATA2`/`DATA6`) and assign to another client.
4. Repeat for all.

Once history is organized, you can **load all files together** for daily use.
help.interpretation_main_metrics_text:
‚Ä¢ **Fat % & BMI:** Blue (Low), Green (Healthy), Yellow (Overweight), Red (Obese).
‚Ä¢ **Water %:** The app uses Blue (Low), Green (Healthy), or Yellow (High). Ideal range is **45-60%** (Women) and **50-65%** (Men).
‚Ä¢ **Visceral Fat:** **1-12** (Healthy), **13+** (Risk).
‚Ä¢ **Metabolic Age:** Green if **‚â§ actual age**. Yellow if **> actual age**.
help.interpretation_segmental_text: Detect asymmetries and prevent injuries! Visualize hidden muscle imbalances (e.g., a weaker leg after recovery) or sports adaptations (e.g., dominant arm in tennis) to correct them in time.
help.interpretation_health_states_text: 'Healthy' ranges are not fixed: the app calculates them automatically following the **scale manual**, adapting to the exact age and gender for each measurement.
help.interpretation_export_text: In the client profile, press **Spreadsheet** to download a clean `ClientAlias.csv` file with the full history. Compatible with Excel, LibreOffice, or Google Sheets.
help.security_local_data_text: BodyMetrics has no server or cloud. **Your data never leaves your device**.
help.security_link_text: The app lives in your browser. If you clear "browsing data", links are lost, but **SD data remains safe**.
help.security_backups_text: It is **vital** to go to Settings > **Download Backup** regularly. This generates a `bm_backup...json` file containing all links between measurements and clients.
help.security_restoration_text:
Use **Upload Backup** to recover data or switch devices.

‚ö†Ô∏è **Manual Sync:**
Data does not sync automatically. To see on mobile what you did on PC, you need to load **TWO** things:
1. The **Backup** (`bm_backup...json`) containing the links.
2. The **DATA.CSV** files from the SD containing the raw data.

Without both files, you won't see any measurements.
help.troubleshooting_common_text:
‚Ä¢ For new measurements: The `DATA.CSV` files from the SD.
‚Ä¢ To restore or sync the app: The `bm_backup...json` file.
help.troubleshooting_missing_data_text: Every time you close the app **you must reload the SD files**. The app remembers who owns what, but needs to read the original file each session.
help.troubleshooting_date_text: If you see measurements from 2010, the scale clock reset (e.g., battery change). Configure the date on the physical scale.

about.title: About BodyMetrics
about.description: FOSS (Free and Open Source Software) application for secure and private segmental body composition analysis.
about.disclaimer: Independent project. Not affiliated with Tanita Corp.

settings.title: Data Management & Security
settings.import_error: File does not look like a valid backup.

alerts.link_success: Measurement successfully linked to client history.
alerts.reset_success: Factory reset complete. All data has been erased.
alerts.reset_confirm: Are you sure? This will delete ALL client lists and links from this browser. This cannot be undone.
alerts.delete_client_confirm: Are you sure? This client will be deleted and their measurements will return to the Inbox.

first_use.title: Welcome to BodyMetrics
first_use.step_inbox_description: Here you load files from the SD card and link pending measurements to the clients you create.
first_use.step_clients_description: Manage your clients. You can analyze their progress with charts and download their data as a spreadsheet.
first_use.step_settings_description: Check your stats, save or restore backups of your work, and delete all data if you need to start over.
first_use.step_help_description: This is the most important section. Please read it carefully now to understand how the app works.

upload.instruction_text: Locate this folder on your SD card:
upload.error: Ensure that the files are DATA.CSV and come from the DATA folder.
